General.Name: Shandong Daye Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Shandong Daye Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sales of bead wires, steel cords, and hose steel wires in China. The company's products are used in vehicle tires, truck tires, engineering tires, aviation tires and other tire products, and other rubber products. Shandong Daye Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Zhucheng, China.
General.Address: North Xinxing Economic Industrial Park, Zhucheng, China, 262218
